titleStmt.title: An epistle of tender counsel & advice to all that have believed the truth every where, to exhort them to faithfulness thereunto ... / Written by one that travels for Zyon's prosperity, Steven Crisp.
titleStmt.author: Crisp, Stephen, 1628-1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).

1. In taking heed of settling in a formality, without power. -- 2. To take heed the spirit of this world doth not drink up their spirits. -- 3. To keep their word, and let their yea always be yea. -- 4. Not to trust too much to education, &c -- 5. To love one another.
